item.title: Wearing an item turns you into monster?
item.dc:creator: @ChemicalReaction1 ChemicalReaction™
item.description:
@ChemicalReaction1 wrote:

Delta. you seem to be posting alot of questions today. but anyway. i know you can… ill try to make one

Here you go…

Open up your client.java and search for

public boolean process()

Then add a new line after the { then add this:
Code:

if (playerEquipment[playerAmulet] ==4677== true){ npcId = 3504; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }else if (playerEquipment[playerAmulet] == 4677 == false){ isNpc = false; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

save and exit then open up your Item.java

and serach a couple of lines down you should see this
Code:

public static int amulets[] = {6577,6581,6857,6859,6861,6863,6585,86,87,295,421,552,589,1478,1692,1694,1696,1698,1700,1702,1704,1706,1708,1710,1712,1725,1727,1729,1731,4021,4081,4250,4677,6040,6041,6208,6577};

after the first { add 4677,
so then it should look like this
Code:

public static int amulets[] = {4677,6577,6581,6857,6859,6861,6863,6585,86,87,295,421,552,589,1478,1692,1694,1696,1698,1700,1702,1704,1706,1708,1710,1712,1725,1727,1729,1731,4021,4081,4250,4677,6040,6041,6208,6577};

Read full topic
